column6: It's a battle royale in the streets of Vegas, as Madrox and Longshot discover that sometimes the only thing worse than a plan that doesn't work...is a plan that works all too well. And when that plan is to try and get the attention of a death  goddess, and that attention consists of her sending her undead warrior hordes against you, well...what's happening in Vegas may well extend to staying there for eternity... 32 PGS./Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | penciller:EMANUELA LUPACCHINO | penciller:David Yardin
